metaface.embodiment
Class MPEG4ExpressionCoordinates

java.lang.Object
  metaface.embodiment.MPEG4ExpressionCoordinates
public class MPEG4ExpressionCoordinates
extends Object

ExpressionCoordinates is a utility class that will quickly transform a 3D array of facial coordinates according to the current expression.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Simon Beard
See Also:
SpikyMPEG4Face, GirlMPEG4Face

expression1 - MPEG-4 number for expression 1
expression2 - MPEG-4 number for expression 2
intensity1 - MPEG-4 number for the intensity of expression 1

getCoords

public float[] getCoords(int expression1,
                         int expression2,
                         int intensity1,
                         int intensity2,
                         int part,
                         int numValues)
Tranforms and gets the coordinates for a particular mixed expression and facial feature

Parameters:
expression1 - MPEG-4 number for expression 1
expression2 - MPEG-4 number for expression 2
intensity1 - MPEG-4 number for the intensity of expression 1
intensity2 - MPEG-4 number for the intensity of expression 2
part - Facial feature array number
numValues - The number of coordinates to return
Returns:
An array of transformed facial feature coodinates

getViseme

public float[] getViseme(int expression1,
                         int expression2,
                         int intensity1,
                         int intensity2,
                         int viseme1,
                         int viseme2,
                         int blend,
                         int numValues)
Tranforms and gets the coordinates for a particular mixed expression and viseme

Parameters:
expression1 - MPEG-4 number for expression 1
expression2 - MPEG-4 number for expression 2
intensity1 - MPEG-4 number for the intensity of expression 1
intensity2 - MPEG-4 number for the intensity of expression 2
blend - MPEG-4 blend for visemes
numValues - The number of coordinates to return
viseme1 - Description of the Parameter
viseme2 - Description of the Parameter
Returns:
An array of transformed facial feature coodinates
